title: Compress Image from one S3 bucket to another
description: Create a S3 bucket to upload a high quality image which will trigger a Lambda function to compress the image and the compressed image will be uploaded to a destination bucket. Finally, sending the notification to SNS topic with Email subscription

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This sample pattern allows users to quickly deploy a source and destination S3 bucket along with the Lambda function which will compress the image.
By using this pattern, users can ensure that they will recieve an email as soon as the compressed image is uploaded to the destination bucket.
See the Github repo for detailed testing instructions.
